items.sentence: He said his father was an architect and that he wanted to be one too.

You should stay away from me. I think that what I have is contagious.
Sorry, but I have to hurry. I have no time to explain this in detail.
I don't know when Tom will get here, but probably tomorrow afternoon.

In a few minutes we'll be landing at New Tokyo International Airport.
Since it was late at night and I was very tired, I stayed at the inn.
